The Begining of Ragnarox.....Chapter 1
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Epics In Progress, Section III: The Begining of Ragnarox.....Chapter 1
By Zercker on Saturday, April 28, 2007 - 06:24 am:

"Unlock!" Yells the old man infront of me. His disc flies into the air and turns into a red ball. It starts to form into a big dog. The red light disappears and a Baku is left. "Alright a Baku." Said the old man. "Come on lets go back to my ranch." He said. The baby Baku follows the old man away. "Which one to choose?" I say to myself. I take one of the disc from my pile and put it over the hole. "Unlock!" I yell. The disc flies into the air and turns into a red ball. The red light disappears and a Mocchi is left sitting there. "A Mocchi." I say to myself. "What should I name you?" I ask it. "How about Chi?" I ask. "Chi-chi!" It says hapily. It hops into my arms. I put the other disc on the hole. "Unlock!" I say. The disc flies into the air and takes shape of a Tiger. The red light disappears and standing there is the rare WhiteHound. It starts howling. "Come here boy." I say. "I will name you Swift." I say.

*************************************************
MEANWHILE

"Xevoin my lord." Says a ChaosDurahan. "We have captured some more monsters." He said. "Gooddddd." Hissed Xevion. Then another ChaosDurahan runs up."Moo." It says. "We have found more disc and a couple of monsters." It said. "Excelent." Belows Moo.

*************************************************
BACK AT THE RANCH

"Hmmmm where should you guys sleep?" I ask myself. "Hey Drew!" Somebody shouts. I turn around and see Genn standing there. "Hey whats up?" I ask. "Well I got my monsters." She said hapily as two monsters pop out from behind her. "I got an Aero and a Lesione." She said. "Thats great." I said. "I got a Mocchi and a WhiteHonud." I say. "Come here guys!" I yell. Sudenly Swift appears out of nowhere while Chi runs around like a drunk. "This is Swift and the Mocchi is Chi." I say. "Well its nice to meet you two." Genn Says. "Aero is named Angel and Lesione is named Lessy." She says. "Hello Lessy, hello Angel." I say. "Wanna train?" I say. "Sure." Says Genn. So they start training.

Next Chapter: The First Battle.........coming soon.

By Swezlon Uno on Tuesday, May 8, 2007 - 12:43 pm:

Nice story. A few errors though. For starters, when a new person talks, you have to start a new paragraph. Another problem is that you tend to change tense a lot. But otherwise no problem. Have you read my story yet? It's called Ancient World Chronicles: the Tale of Good and Evil. You should also read sturnum94s, foxmans, and waddafxup101 stories. By the way, in front is two words.
